text:
"The Lion King's Timon and Pumbaa" is an animated Disney television series. It is based off The Lion King movie. The series was shown from September 16, 1995 to 1999. It had a total of 86 episodes.
Video Chile: ADV Garantía Original Video.
Five VHS cassettes contaning 35 episodes of the series were released on the Argentinina in Chilean.
Video Chile: ADV Garantía Original Video.
Five DVDs containing 35 episodes of the series were released on the Argentinina in Chilean.
Awards and nominations.
Daytime Emmy Awards
